when.test: shOption == 1 and shOption != null and shOption != ''

mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT a.fsSeq) FROM fish a LEFT JOIN seasonandfish b ON a.fsSeq = b.fish_fsSeq left join commoncode c on c.cdSeq = b.season_ssSeq WHERE 1=1
WHERE FIND_IN_SET('11', (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(b.season_ssSeq ORDER BY a.fsSeq) FROM seasonandfish b WHERE a.fsSeq = b.fish_fsSeq)) > 0;

SELECT a.fsSeq ,a.fsName ,a.fsSeason ,a.fsDelNy ,a.fsRegDate ,b.fish_fsSeq ,GROUP_CONCAT(b.season_ssSeq ORDER BY a.fsSeq) AS seasonsSeq ,GROUP_CONCAT(c.cdName ORDER BY b.season_ssSeq) AS seasonsName FROM fish a LEFT JOIN seasonandfish b ON a.fsSeq = b.fish_fsSeq left join commoncode c on c.cdSeq = b.season_ssSeq
group by a.fsSeq
HAVING FIND_IN_SET(#{shSeason} , seasonsSeq) > 0
ORDER BY a.fsRegDate DESC
SELECT a.fsSeq ,a.fsName ,a.fsDelNy ,b.ship_spSeq FROM fishandship b join fish a on b.fish_fsSeq = a.fsSeq WHERE 1=1 ORDER BY a.fsRegDate DESC
SELECT a.fsSeq ,a.fsName ,a.fsDelNy ,b.ship_spSeq FROM fishandship b join fish a on b.fish_fsSeq = a.fsSeq WHERE 1=1 GROUP BY a.fsSeq ORDER BY a.fsRegDate DESC
SELECT a.fsSeq ,a.fsName ,a.fsDelNy ,b.ship_spSeq FROM fishandship b join fish a on b.fish_fsSeq = a.fsSeq WHERE 1=1 GROUP BY a.fsSeq ORDER BY a.fsRegDate DESC

SELECT a.fsSeq ,a.fsName ,a.fsSeason ,a.fsDelNy ,a.fsRegDate ,b.fish_fsSeq ,GROUP_CONCAT(b.season_ssSeq ORDER BY a.fsSeq) AS seasonsSeq ,GROUP_CONCAT(c.cdName ORDER BY b.season_ssSeq) AS seasonsName FROM fish a LEFT JOIN seasonandfish b ON a.fsSeq = b.fish_fsSeq left join commoncode c on c.cdSeq = b.season_ssSeq WHERE 1=1 AND fsSeq = #{fsSeq}
mapper.update: UPDATE fish SET fsDelNy = 1 WHERE 1=1 AND fsSeq = #{fsSeq}
